title: Regal Ruby & Polki Diamond Drop Jhumka Earrings
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish; Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds); Ruby Cabochons.
features: These earrings feature a striking geometric design. The top consists of Polki diamonds in a floral quatrefoil setting, transitioning to a smaller Polki-studded oval, leading to a larger, square ruby cabochon framed by multiple rows of glittering Polki diamonds. The ruby cabochon is further accented with a central Polki diamond, creating a captivating symmetrical pattern. The 'Hyderabadi Polish' gives the gold a rich, warm hue.
colors: Predominantly Gold and Ruby Red with the subtle brilliance of Polki Diamonds.
occasions: festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Suitable for both traditional South Indian attire and elegant contemporary ensembles.
description: These earrings showcase a beautiful blend of traditional Polki craftsmanship with a modern geometric design. The rich ruby red creates a luxurious appeal, while the Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's brilliance. They are a testament to exquisite craftsmanship, perfect for adding a touch of royalty to your look. The uncut Polki diamonds add a unique, antique charm, making them a valuable heirloom piece.
